title: why P and R both 0?
body:
1.train  on my own dataset
2.single class
3.run `python train.py --data data/stomata.data --cfg cfg/yolov3-tiny.cfg --epochs 10 --single-cls --weights weights/yolov3-tiny.weights --name data/stomata.names`
4.i've tried different cls in hyp but it doesn't work even default
5.latest pull
